title: Meet Your Advisor
description: Meet with your advisor to discuss your academic plan.

title: Declare A Major
description: Declare a major in the College of Engineering.

title: Individual Project 1
description: Complete the first individual project: implementing the connect four backend.

title: Individual Project 2
description: Complete the second individual project: implementing the connect four frontend.

title: Homework 1: Boolean Algebra
description: Evaluate the truth tables and k-maps into sum of product form. Apply the boolean logic laws to simplify the statements.

title: Homework 2: SystemVerilog
description: Implement the given circuit in SystemVerilog.

title: Lab 1
description: Implent a 16-bit adder in SystemVerilog and evaluate on the PYNQ board.

title: Lab 2
description: Implement an ALU in SystemVerilog and evaluate.

title: Homework 1: Mathematical Fundamentals
description: Review differential equations, Fourier transforms, and LaPlace transforms.

title: Homework 2: Working in MATLAB
description: Implement the given control system in MATLAB.

title: Homework 1: The Physical Layer
description: Review the physical layer of the OSI model.

title: Homework 2: The Link Layer
description: Review the link layer of the OSI model.

title: Reading Like a Writer Post
description: Discuss the Essay 'Reading Like a Writer'
